property.name: accumulo_root_password
property.description: Password for the Accumulo root user. This password will be used to initialize Accumulo and to create the trace user. Changing this will not change the password for the Accumulo root user.

property.name: instance_secret
property.description: A secret unique to a given instance that all Accumulo server processes must know in order to communicate with one another.

property.name: trace_password
property.description: Password for the trace user. The trace user will be created with this password if that user does not already exist. Changing this will not change the password for the trace user.

property.name: content
property.description: The template for a client accumulo-env.sh file.

property.name: server_content
property.description: The template for a server accumulo-env.sh file.
